text.autoconfig.turtleshelldrop.title: Turtle Shell Drop Config
text.autoconfig.turtleshelldrop.option.s: Chance that a turtle shell will drop when a turtle is killed.
text.autoconfig.turtleshelldrop.option.d: Drop shells when the turtle is killed directly by the player.
text.autoconfig.turtleshelldrop.option.b: Allow drops from dead baby turtles.
